001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
011
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.ICustomJavaDataType;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.InsertAnchorExtension.InsertAnchorNode;
015
016import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
017import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
018
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.function.Predicate;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023
024import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
025import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029public interface IMarkupString<TYPE extends IMarkupString<TYPE>>
030    extends ICustomJavaDataType<TYPE> {
031  /**
032   * Get the underlying Flexmark factory supporting markup serialization.
033   *
034   * @return the factory
035   */
036  @NonNull
037  FlexmarkFactory getFlexmarkFactory();
038
039  /**
040   * Get the top-level Flexmark document node for the markup.
041   *
042   * @return the node
043   */
044  @NonNull
045  Document getDocument();
046
047  /**
048   * Determine if the markup has no contents.
049   *
050   * @return {@code true} if the markup has no contents or {@code false} otherwise
051   */
052  boolean isEmpty();
053
054  // /**
055  // * Write HTML content to the provided {@code xmlStreamWriter} using the
056  // provided {@code
057  // namespace}.
058  // *
059  // * @param writer
060  // * the writer
061  // * @param namespace
062  // * the XML namespace for the HTML
063  // * @throws XMLStreamException
064  // * if an error occurred while writing
065  // */
066  // void writeHtml(@NonNull XMLStreamWriter2 writer, @NonNull String namespace)
067  // throws
068  // XMLStreamException;
069
070  /**
071   * Get the HyperText Markup Language (HTML) representation of this markup
072   * string.
073   *
074   * @return the HTML
075   */
076  @NonNull
077  String toHtml();
078
079  /**
080   * Get the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this
081   * markup string.
082   *
083   * @param namespace
084   *          the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
085   *
086   * @return the XHTML
087   * @throws XMLStreamException
088   *           if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the
089   *           underlying XML stream
090   * @throws IOException
091   *           if an error occurred while generating the XHTML data
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  String toXHtml(@NonNull String namespace) throws XMLStreamException, IOException;
095
096  /**
097   * Get the Commonmark Markdown representation of this markup string.
098   *
099   * @return the Markdown
100   */
101  @NonNull
102  String toMarkdown();
103
104  /**
105   * Get a Markdown representation of this markup string, which will be created by
106   * the provided formatter.
107   *
108   * @param formatter
109   *          the specific Markdown formatter to use in producing the Markdown
110   *
111   * @return the Markdown
112   */
113  @NonNull
114  String toMarkdown(@NonNull Formatter formatter);
115
116  /**
117   * Retrieve all nodes contained within this markup text as a stream.
118   *
119   * @return a depth first stream
120   */
121  @NonNull
122  Stream<Node> getNodesAsStream();
123
124  /**
125   * Get markup inserts used as place holders within the string.
126   *
127   * @return a list of insets or an empty list if no inserts are present
128   */
129  @NonNull
130  default List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts() {
131    return getInserts(insert -> true);
132  }
133
134  /**
135   * Retrieve all insert statements that are contained within this markup text
136   * that match the provided filter.
137   *
138   * @param filter
139   *          a filter used to identify matching insert statements
140   * @return the matching insert statements
141   */
142  @NonNull
143  List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts(
144      @NonNull Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter);
145
146  /**
147   * Determine if the Markup consists of block elements.
148   *
149   * @return {@code true} if the markup consists of block elements, or
150   *         {@code false} otherwise
151   */
152  boolean isBlock();
153
154  /**
155   * Write the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this
156   * markup string to the provided stream writer.
157   *
158   * @param namespace
159   *          the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
160   * @param streamWriter
161   *          the XML stream to write to
162   * @throws XMLStreamException
163   *           if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the XML
164   *           stream
165   */
166  void writeXHtml(
167      @NonNull String namespace,
168      @NonNull XMLStreamWriter2 streamWriter) throws XMLStreamException;
169
170  /**
171   * Write the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this
172   * markup string to the provided stream writer using the provided XML event
173   * factory.
174   *
175   * @param namespace
176   *          the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
177   * @param eventFactory
178   *          the XML event factory used to generate XML events to write
179   * @param eventWriter
180   *          the XML event stream to write to
181   * @throws XMLStreamException
182   *           if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the XML
183   *           stream
184   */
185  void writeXHtml(
186      @NonNull String namespace,
187      @NonNull XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory,
188      @NonNull XMLEventWriter eventWriter) throws XMLStreamException;
189}
